statements: DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND city = 'New York'
DELETE FROM Suppliers WHERE country = 'USA' AND cost_factor < 1.0
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM products WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM products WHERE product_price < 100);
DELETE FROM ratings WHERE rating = 1 AND comment IS NULL;
DELETE FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT supplier_id FROM products);
